name: is373_vibecoding
description: Project configured with quality gates: Prettier, ESLint, Stylelint, Husky, CI workflow

scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:stylelint
scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cp index.html work.html learn.html thoughts.html about.html styles.css script.js include-partials.js favicon.svg manifest.webmanifest build/ || true && mkdir -p build/partials && cp -r partials/* build/partials/ || true && mkdir -p build/references && cp -r research/references/* build/references/ || true && mkdir -p build/assets/data && cp -r assets/data/* build/assets/data/ || true
